projects.title: StaffMate
projects.description: Revolutionary mobile employee scheduling and time tracking platform that has been transforming the special events industry since 2002. StaffMate pioneered intuitive drag & drop scheduling with comprehensive time tracking capabilities, becoming an essential tool for businesses managing diverse teams. The platform offers a complete ecosystem for workforce management with robust features that streamline operations and boost productivity.

projects.title: Sarajevo Film Festival Mobile App
projects.description: Official native mobile application for the prestigious Sarajevo Film Festival, featuring seamless ticket purchasing, film scheduling, and interactive audience engagement. The app integrates secure payment processing with Mastercard partnership, offering exclusive discounts and benefits. Users can browse the complete film catalog, vote for the UniCredit Audience Award, and access real-time festival information with an intuitive, modern interface.
highlights: Official app for international film festival
Integrated Mastercard payment system with discounts
Interactive voting system for audience awards
Real-time festival schedule and location mapping

projects.title: Relia
projects.description: Innovative healthcare mobile application designed to empower cancer patients during chemotherapy treatment. Relia provides a comprehensive platform for tracking and monitoring chemotherapy side effects with medically-reliable severity indicators. The app features intuitive symptom logging, detailed analytics, shareable reports for healthcare providers, and widget support for quick access. With a 5.0-star rating, Relia has become an essential tool for patients and doctors to collaborate effectively in cancer care management.
highlights: iOS 14+ Widget support for quick symptom logging

projects.title: K-chu
projects.description: Dynamic K-pop fan community platform that connects enthusiasts across Indonesia and beyond. K-chu creates an engaging social ecosystem where fans can discover latest K-pop content, participate in community discussions, share fan art, and stay updated with idol activities. The platform features real-time chat, event notifications, exclusive content sharing, and interactive fan engagement tools that bring the global K-pop community together.
highlights: Advanced image processing for fan art sharing
Custom notification system for idol updates

projects.title: CoppaMagz Community
projects.description: Premier K-pop community events platform powered by Indonesia's leading K-pop magazine. CoppaMagz Community serves as the central hub for discovering and participating in the most current K-pop events, concerts, fan meetings, and cultural activities. The platform features comprehensive event listings, ticket integration, community forums, and exclusive content from CoppaMagz magazine, making it the go-to destination for K-pop enthusiasts seeking authentic cultural experiences.
highlights: Cross-platform development: React web + Flutter mobile

projects.title: Konekseed
projects.description: Professional networking platform designed to connect entrepreneurs, startups, and business professionals seeking strategic partnerships. Konekseed facilitates meaningful business relationships through intelligent matching algorithms, comprehensive business profiles, and secure communication channels. The platform enables users to discover potential co-founders, investors, mentors, and business partners while providing tools for collaboration, project management, and deal facilitation.
highlights: AI-powered business partner matching with Core ML

projects.title: Komix - Potek Dance Festival
projects.description: Comprehensive digital platform for Indonesia's premier dance festival, Potek Dance Festival. Komix manages the complete festival ecosystem including artist registrations, event scheduling, live streaming capabilities, audience engagement, and competition management. The platform supports multiple dance categories, real-time voting systems, social media integration, and provides an immersive experience for both participants and spectators of Indonesia's biggest dance celebration.
highlights: Full-stack development: React web + Flutter mobile
Live streaming and real-time voting system
